title: Two Layer Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '400g caster sugar', '65g unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '250ml milk', '125ml vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250ml hot, brewed coffee', '2 eggs']
